title: Ada Lovelace Day - 24 Mars 2009
html:
Ada Lovelace Day is an international day of blogging to draw attention to women excelling in technology.

Ada Lovelace Day la journée de blogging internationale sur les femmes qui assurent grave dans les technologies.

Women’s contributions often go unacknowledged, their innovations seldom mentioned, their faces rarely recognised. We want you to tell the world about these unsung heroines. Entrepreneurs, innovators, sysadmins, programmers, designers, games developers, hardware experts, tech journalists, tech consultants. The list of tech-related careers is endless.

Lire Ada Lovelace Day: women in technology I admire ou Comment madame Michu a transformé l’informatique ou Ada Lovelace Day.
